extension.name: Hdwplayer
extension.author: HDW Player
extension.copyright: Copyright (c) 2011 - 2013 HDW Player. All rights reserved.
extension.description: A Simple Video Player module for HDW Player. Video inputs are derived from the Component.

field.name: width
field.label: Width
field.description: Width of the Player

field.name: height
field.label: Height
field.description: Height of the Player

field.name: categories
field.label: Select Categories
field.description: Select category of videos for the player
field.query: select id, name from #__hdwplayer_category where published=1 order by name ASC

field.name: showtitle
field.label: Show Video Title
field.description: Show Video Title above the Player

field.name: showdescription
field.label: Show Video Description
field.description: Show Video Description below the Player

field.name: autoplay
field.label: Autoplay
field.description: Start Playing the Video automatically on Page Load

field.name: skinmode
field.label: Skin Mode
field.description: Show skin only on moving the cursor inside the player (or) make it static

field.name: playlistautostart
field.label: PlayList AutoStart
field.description: Option to start the Next Video automatically at the end of the Current Playing Video from the Playlist.

field.name: playlistopen
field.label: PlayList Open
field.description: Option to keep the Playlist opened by default.

field.name: playlistrandom
field.label: PlayList Random
field.description: Play the videos in random from the playlist.

field.name: buffer
field.label: Buffer Value
field.description: This should be a numeric value from 0 - 10. This property is used to gather given seconds of video data in advance to play the video. Buffer seconds are used to improve the video performance in Progressive Downloaded Videos. The default value is 3.

field.name: volumelevel
field.label: Intial Volume Level
field.description: This should be a numeric value from 0 - 100. This property is used to control the initial volume of the player. The default value is 50.

field.name: stretch
field.label: Stretch Type
field.description: Scaling of the Video

field.name: controlbar
field.label: Enable ControlBar
field.description: Show (or) Hide the Control Bar from the Player.

field.name: playpausedock
field.label: Enable PlayPause Dock
field.description: Show (or) Hide the PlayPause Dock from the Player.

field.name: progressbar
field.label: Enable Progress Bar
field.description: Show (or) Hide the Progress Bar from the Player.

field.name: timerdock
field.label: Enable Timer Dock
field.description: Show (or) Hide the Timer Dock from the Player.

field.name: sharedock
field.label: Enable Share Dock
field.description: Show (or) Hide the Share Dock from the Player.

field.name: volumedock
field.label: Enable Volume Dock
field.description: Show (or) Hide the Volume Dock from the Player.

field.name: fullscreendock
field.label: Enable FullScreen Dock
field.description: Show (or) Hide the FullScreen Dock from the Player.

field.name: playdock
field.label: Enable Play Dock
field.description: Show (or) Hide the Play Dock from the Player.

field.name: playlist
field.label: Enable PlayList
field.description: Show (or) Hide the PlayList from the Player.

field.name: autodetect
field.label: Autodetect Video
field.description: Autodetect Video from Page URL.

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A Suffix to be applied to the CSS class of the Module.This allows for individual Module Styling.
